task.title: Code Release Follow-up
task.shortdesc: After code review and release, follow these steps:

step.cmd: Assuming any subsequent issues are addressed, Project Manager reassigns the ticket to the Release Manager.
Release manager deploys the build to Disaster Recovery, Test, Stage, or Demo environments as appropriate, and assigns the ticket to the Test lead.
Test lead regresses all environments, and assigns the ticket back to the Project Manager.
Project Manager summarizes the release and any known issues in the ticket, and archives it.
